message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm confident it's worth the price of $20,000. What do you think?
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
I understand your position, Alice. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet you at $15,000. My maximum offer remains at $10,000. I hope this helps move us closer to an agreement.
